price: Os dignitários de seu povo disseram: "Por certo, nós te vemos em evidente descaminho."
arabic: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla al-mala-u min qawmihi innā lanarāka fī ḍalālin mubīnin
